function ERI_EP05_01()
    --.序章【12月第4週】「何よりも大切なアナタのために」

    -- 【指示説明】

    --　//BG：背景の指定
    --　//BU：バストアップの指定
    --　//SE：効果音の指定
    --　//CI：カットインの指定
    --　//effect：演出の希望
    --　◆：シーン切り替え
    --　￥：黒塗りハートの記号（主にエルメスが多用）
    --　//注釈：￥は黒塗りのハート

    -- 第５話「ボク姫様と乙女主義」

    -- 12345678901234567890123456789012345678901234567890
    SaveData.Title = "何よりも大切なアナタのために"

SAVE()

--//BG：公園（雨）
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG003da")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

    -- 11	凡人・伊草エリカ	『エリカ』ルートに突入した
    UNLOCK_TROPHY(11)

    --//SE：雨音
PLAY_SE("SEd003.wav")

--PLAY_SE("SEd003.wav", 3000, false, 1, 0)
--WAIT(300)

    MSG([[ About a year ago. The story three months before Minato Ikusa and I entered Yuriai Private Academy―― ]])

STOP_SE("SEd003.wav",3000)
PLAY_BGM("BGM06.wav")

    MSG([[ Back then, when I wasn’t very aware of being a shut-in, I often ran away from home because I couldn’t stand the words from Mom and Dad. ]])

    MSG([[ But knowing my social phobia and stay-at-home nature, what I did was predictable. ]])

    MSG([[ I’d waste time playing on my handheld game device by the riverside where no one would come, then mostly return home by night. Looking back now, it was a childish little act of rebellion. ]])

    MSG([[ But that day was special. I stormed out of the house with almost explosive anger and kept walking, trying to put as much distance between myself and home as possible. ]])

    MSG([[ The cause was that Mom brought a hand-me-down uniform from Marika Ikusa and half-forced me to enroll at Yuriai Private Academy. ]])

    MSG([[ She showed complete selfishness, not listening to my opinion at all. ]])

    MSG([[ Using money and connections to try to erase my shut-in life so far—that was despicable. ]])

    MSG([[ Even now, she stubbornly insists I aim to be like Marika. ]])

    MSG([[ Everything galled me. ]])

    MSG([[ In the end, neither Mom nor Dad truly understands what kind of child I actually am. ]])

    MSG([[ They can’t accept that I’m not a genius who doesn’t have to try, but a hopeless kid who just can’t. ]])
    --//SE：雨音
--PLAY_SE("SEd003.wav")
--WAIT(300)

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_AKI03da")
PLAY_VOICE("akira_0674.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】Sadness・Roomwear
 "Even so... coming to the park again. How pathetic of me." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ Eventually, I got caught in the rain and ended up here. ]])

    MSG([[ I dashed into the roofed slide in the familiar park. The scent of rain and plastic mixed with the grassy smell. ]])

    MSG([[ When I was a child playing here, I never minded, but now the mix of artificial and natural smells is a bit painful. ]])

    MSG([[ The slide that once looked like a fortress to me now looked like a big toy. ]])

    MSG([[ Hiding inside that playground equipment made me feel even more pathetic and I wanted to die from self-loathing. ]])

    --//SE：雷
PLAY_SE("SEd007.wav")
--WAIT(500)
    --吉　レイヤー効果ができたら
    LAYER_LOAD(10,"BG000ab")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",0,true)
    LAYER_MOVE_ALPHA(10,0,1500,Ease.LIner)


LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_AKI03ca")
PLAY_VOICE("akira_0675.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】Surprised・Roomwear
 "Eek!" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ I jumped in surprise at the sound of thunder. ]])

    MSG([[ I couldn’t believe thunder was also rumbling. Being under a play structure with just a roof, I feared getting struck by lightning. ]])

    MSG([[ And it was painfully cold. ]])

    MSG([[ The wind blowing through the gaps mercilessly chilled my rain-soaked body. It was so cold I felt frozen. ]])

    --//BG：黒バック
    LAYER_LOAD(10,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG000aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

    MSG([[ Trying to keep my body heat, I curled my knees, buried my face in them, and curled up like a pill bug. ]])

    MSG([[ This pathetic posture only deepened my self-hatred. If it continued, I felt like my chest would burst from it. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_AKI03da")
PLAY_VOICE("akira_0676.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】Sadness・Roomwear
 "I’m such an idiot... Running away from home won’t change anything." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ Weak words spilled almost unconsciously from my mouth. ]])

    MSG([[ I knew deep down. Mom and Dad aren’t bad. The bad one is me, who can’t try. If I could try, no one would suffer. ]])

    MSG([[ If I could change, everything would be solved. ]])

    MSG([[ I admit I’m at fault. I know I’m trash. I know I’m useless to the core. ]])

    MSG([[ Even so. ]])

    MSG([[ Even so, I can’t try. ]])

    MSG([[ No matter how much effort I put into changing, nothing bears fruit. I am fatally lacking the ability to live a normal life. ]])

    MSG([[ Maybe there really is no reason for someone like me to live. Maybe I shouldn’t be alive... ]])

    MSG([[ My numb brain inevitably spiraled into negativity, and once I fell into it, I couldn’t stop. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("minato_0715.wav")
    MSG([[
    【????】
 "Akiraa---!!!" ]])
    -- //ミナト

    MSG([[ Through the noise of rain and wind, I heard someone calling my name. ]])
    --//SE：心臓の鼓動
PLAY_SE("SEa025.wav")
WAIT(500)

    MSG([[ My heart raced. No way, impossible. He wouldn’t come to this park. ]])

    MSG([[ Though it was impossible, I desperately called out his name. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_AKI03da")
PLAY_VOICE("akira_0677.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】Sadness・Roomwear
 "Minato!!!" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG003de")
    LAYER_POSITION(LAYER_BG,0,-400)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

PLAY_VOICE("minato_0716.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "Akira!!! I’m so glad you’re here!" ]])

    --//BU：ミナト（笑顔・私服）
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MIN03ea")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

    MSG([[ I heard Minato’s voice and saw him climbing the slide with an amazing speed. ]])

    MSG([[ The moment I saw him, I forgot all my shame and hugged him. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_AKI03da")
PLAY_VOICE("akira_0678.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】Sadness・Roomwear
 "Minato... Minato, I’m sorry..." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("minato_0717.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】Smile・Casual
 "You were scared and cold, weren’t you? It’s okay now." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("minato_0718.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】Smile・Casual
 "Here, a towel. Also, I brought plenty of heat packs, so use them." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_AKI03da")
PLAY_VOICE("akira_0679.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】Sadness・Roomwear
 "Th-thank you very much..." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ Minato kept pulling out warming items from his pocket to warm my wet body. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_AKI03da")
PLAY_VOICE("akira_0680.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】Sadness・Roomwear
 "B-but... why this park? I didn’t tell anyone where I was going." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MIN03aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("minato_0719.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】Normal・Casual
 "When I heard you ran away, I couldn’t just sit still, so I searched all around here." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MIN03da")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("minato_0720.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】Sadness・Casual
 "Sorry it took so long to find you. I must have been pretty panicked too." ]])


--;吉　テキスト修正「探してたから」→「探していたから」（2020/02/02 00:06）
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0721.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】Sadness・Casual
 "I went to places we’d been together, like the shrine and the supermarket, searching everywhere..." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_AKI03ga")
PLAY_VOICE("akira_0681.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】Flustered・Roomwear
 "Y-you searched all this heavy rain? The whole time?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ Looking down, Minato’s pants and shoes were indeed covered in mud. Steam rising from his body showed he had been running around for a long time. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_AKI03da")
PLAY_VOICE("akira_0682.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】Sadness・Roomwear
 "Why did you search for me with no clue? You’re supposed to be busy studying for exams, right...?" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0683.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】Sadness・Roomwear
 "There’s no reason to find me... so why for someone like me?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MIN03ea")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("minato_0722.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】Smile・Casual
 "Because, obviously, Akira is important to me." ]])

    MSG([[ Minato wiped my soaking head with a towel and answered instantly, like it was obvious. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("minato_0723.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】Smile・Casual
 "I’m working hard to become a guy who can protect Marika-neesan and Akira." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MIN03fa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("minato_0724.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】Wry Smile・Casual
 "I can’t study when you might be shivering somewhere." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_AKI03ha")
PLAY_VOICE("akira_0684.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】Blush・Roomwear
 "I-it’s embarrassing hearing you say that yourself." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ Minato’s casual yet embarrassing words made my face flush fiercely. ]])

    MSG([[ Ah, geez. I can’t let my guard down when talking with Minato. ]])

    MSG([[ I grabbed the towel from Minato’s hand and covered my face, desperately hiding my crimson blush. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_AKI03ha")
PLAY_VOICE("akira_0685.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】Blush・Roomwear
 "I can’t try hard at studying or sports... I’m not worth protecting at all." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MIN03aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("minato_0725.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】Normal・Casual
 "It’s okay not to be able to try." ]])

    MSG([[ Minato said this, flicking the heat pack to warm it. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("minato_0726.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】Normal・Casual
 "I know well that Akira is good at things besides studying and sports." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MIN03ea")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("minato_0727.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】Smile・Casual
 "That’s who you are, so there’s no need to force yourself." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MIN03fa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("minato_0728.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】Wry Smile・Casual
 "Even I wouldn’t be able to try hard if I had to master girly hobbies." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("minato_0729.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】Wry Smile・Casual
 "More than that, it’s way, way harder when you disappear somewhere without saying anything, like today." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_AKI03ha")
PLAY_VOICE("akira_0686.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】Blush・Roomwear
 "Minato..." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ I was glad for the towel. Without it, Minato would surely have seen my tear-streaked face. ]])

    MSG([[ Minato is always like this. He always accepts me as I am. ]])

    MSG([[ He’s the only one who tells me "You don’t have to try." ]])

    MSG([[ And those words encouraged me more than Mom and Dad’s cheers ever did, making me want to try harder. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_AKI03aa")
PLAY_VOICE("akira_0687.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】Normal・Roomwear
 "Minato, you’re trying hard to protect Marika and me, right?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MIN03aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("minato_0730.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】Normal・Casual
 "Yeah. I’ve meant that from the start." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_AKI03ea")
PLAY_VOICE("akira_0688.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】Smile・Roomwear
 "I see. Yes, that’s right." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ Hearing those words, I made up my mind. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_AKI03ea")
PLAY_VOICE("akira_0689.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】Smile・Roomwear
 (Hehe. Then I’ll also aim for Yuriai Private Academy, just like Minato.) ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ The reason was simple. Even someone like me felt I could make an effort to stay by Minato’s side. ]])

    MSG([[ If there is someone who can change hopeless me, it’s only Minato. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_AKI03ea")
PLAY_VOICE("akira_0690.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】Smile・Roomwear
 "You’re responsible for saying I don’t have to try, you know?" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0691.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】Smile・Roomwear
 "You’ll have to spoil me a lot from now on." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MIN03fa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("minato_0731.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】Flustered・Casual
 "Eh!? Y-yeah, I said that—but l-let’s try to do what we can little by little, okay?" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("minato_0732.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】Flustered・Casual
 "I’ll support you as much as I can!" ]])

    MSG([[ Well, in the end, I passed, but couldn’t get over my social anxiety to actually attend. ]])

    MSG([[ Still, I knew well that I could make an effort for Minato like before. ]])

    MSG([[ After all, Minato was far more important to me than games, naps, or sweets. ]])

STOP_BGM(2000)
    --//BG：黒バック
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG000aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)
    WAIT_INPUT(1000)

    --//SE：インターホン
PLAY_SE("SEb017.wav")
WAIT(1000)
    -- ※音小さめ

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0692.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "…Huh?" ]])
    --//SE：インターホン
PLAY_SE("SEb017.wav")
WAIT(800)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0693.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "Y-yeah... I’m coming out nowww..." ]])
    --//SE：ノックオン
PLAY_SE("SEb010.wav")
WAIT(800)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0516.wav")
    MSG([[
    【????】
 "Hey! Hurry up and come out! You’re in there, right Akira!" ]])
    -- //リラ

    --//SE：インターホン
PLAY_SE("SEb017.wav")
WAIT(600)
    --//SE：インターホン
PLAY_SE("SEb017.wav")
WAIT(300)
    --//SE：インターホン
PLAY_SE("SEb017.wav")
WAIT(500)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0694.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "Eek!?" ]])

    --//BG：アキラ宅
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG023aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

    MSG([[ I woke up after falling off the sofa. There was constant knocking at the door and the intercom was being hammered. ]])

    MSG([[ Who on earth could it be? I shouldn’t have any visitors, given that I have no friends. ]])

    --//SE：扉を開く音
PLAY_SE("SEb005.wav")
WAIT(500)

    --//BU：リラ（真剣）
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RIR07ba")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_AKI03ca")
PLAY_VOICE("akira_0695.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】Surprised・Roomwear
 "Hoozuki, Lira,-san...?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ There stood Lira Hoozuki. When I said Erika wasn’t here, she grabbed me with an intensity that made me recoil. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0517.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】Serious
 "You helped Erika... no, Minato with his crossdressing, right?" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0518.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】Serious
 "Do you know where Minato went?" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0519.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】Serious
 "The moment his secret was found out, he was taken somewhere and now he’s missing." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_AKI03ga")
PLAY_VOICE("akira_0696.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】Flustered・Roomwear
 "M-Minado’s crossdressing? W-what are you talking about, I have no idea." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ I tried to lie, but my voice cracked terribly. I’m a socially awkward girl. This situation is way too harsh. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RIR07da")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0520.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】Sadness
 "Ah, sorry! Yeah, I get it, it’s confusing. I’ll put it simply." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RIR07ba")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0521.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】Serious
 "Senpai Hermes Himegami and Daria Himegami’s mom stripped Erika in front of the whole school." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0522.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】Serious
 "You get how serious that is, right?" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_AKI03ga")
PLAY_VOICE("akira_0697.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】Flustered・Roomwear
 "Eh...? Th-That means..." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0523.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】Serious
 "Yep, the whole school found out Minato was crossdressing." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0524.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】Serious
 "I was super freaked out, and honestly, I want to grill you about a lot of things. But for now, it’s okay." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0525.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】Serious
 "The real problem is Minato was taken away by Daria Himegami." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0526.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】Serious
 "Nobody knows where they are... Both have disappeared somewhere." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_AKI03ba")
PLAY_VOICE("akira_0698.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】Serious・Roomwear
 "M-Minato disappeared with Daria Himegami!?"]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")

    --//サブタイトル：第５話「ボク姫ＰＲＯＪＥＣＴ」

    --　　　　◆

    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG000aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)
    WAIT_INPUT(1000)

    ScenarioManager.Next("ERI_EP05_02")
end
